Galery>Landscape>Switzerland

Switzerland consist of 4 main different regions which are different have unique geological and climatic characteristics:

  • Jura
  • Swiss Plateau
  • Foothills of the Alps
  • Alps
  • Southern Side of the Alps

I have devided the region 9 different region as indicated by the next picture:

Bern
Central Switzerland
Foothill of the Alps
Grison
Jura
Romandie
Swiss Plateau
Ticino
Valais
